Package ua.code.intership.proft.it.soft.service.statistic

Class PlanetStatisticsProcessor

java.lang.Object
ua.code.intership.proft.it.soft.service.statistic.AbstractStatisticsProcessor
ua.code.intership.proft.it.soft.service.statistic.PlanetStatisticsProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
StatisticsProcessor
public final class PlanetStatisticsProcessor extends AbstractStatisticsProcessor implements StatisticsProcessor
PlanetStatisticsProcessor is a class that extends AbstractStatisticsProcessor and implements the StatisticsProcessor interface that provides functionality to collect statistics from JSON data related to planets. It processes JSON files, extracts specified attributes, and collects statistics on them.

This class is Singleton that gather statistics information.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static StatisticsProcessor getInstance()
      Returns the instance of PlanetStatisticsProcessor. If the instance is already created, it is returned. If the instance is not created, a new instance is created and returned. In this case, we guarantee the allowing to a shared resource because class has only one instance.
      Returns:
      the instance of PlanetStatisticsProcessor

    • collectStatistics

      public void collectStatistics(File file, String attribute) throws IOException
      Processes the given JSON file into FileReader.readFile(java.io.File, java.lang.Class<T>, java.util.function.Consumer<T>) method and collects statistics for the given attribute using consumer parameter. The collected statistics are stored in a set, which can be retrieved using the AbstractStatisticsProcessor.getStatisticsSet() method.
      Specified by:
      collectStatistics in interface StatisticsProcessor
      Parameters:
      file - the JSON file to process
      attribute - the attribute to collect statistics for
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the file
